queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-data}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-master}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-master}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-master}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-data}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-data}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory
Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-master}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-data}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests
Deployments should be assigned with a PodDisruptionBudget to ensure high availability

files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only is not targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-master}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-data}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{elasticsearch}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{elasticsearch}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{elasticsearch}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-master}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{elasticsearch}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-master}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{elasticsearch}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-data}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{elasticsearch}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-data}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{elasticsearch}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

queries.query_name: Object Is Using A Deprecated API Version
queries.description: Kubernetes APIs evolve over time and are sometimes removed with newer releases. To prevent incompatibilities when upgrading Kubernetes, deprecated APIs should be replaced with newer and more stable API versions.

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-data}}.apiVersion of StatefulSet  is deprecated and is {{apps/v1beta2}}
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-master}}.apiVersion of StatefulSet  is deprecated and is {{apps/v1beta2}}
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only}}.apiVersion of Deployment  is deprecated and is {{extensions/v1beta1}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-data}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-master}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-master}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-data}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
metadata.name={{release-name-elasticsearch5-coordinating-only}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.
StatefulSets should be assigned with a PodDisruptionBudget to ensure high availability

files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-elasticsearch5-master is not targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget
metadata.name=release-name-elasticsearch5-data is not targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget
